data.title: Clifford Cupp Obituary
data.meta_description: Obituary for Clifford E. Cupp | Clifford E. Cupp, 62, of Macon, Georgia, passed away September 1, 2021.  Graveside services will be 11:00 AM on Wednesday, September 8, 2021, at Glen Haven Memorial Gardens with the...
data.meta_site_name: Clifford Cupp Obituary | September 1, 2021 | Macon, GA
data.text:
Clifford E. Cupp, 62, of Macon, Georgia, passed away September 1, 2021. Graveside services will be 11:00 AM on Wednesday, September 8, 2021, at Glen Haven Memorial Gardens with the Reverend Brad Marchman officiating.

Clifford was a beloved husband, dad, brother, and uncle. He loved fishing, drag racing, baseball, and hotrods. He drove a tow truck for years for Billy Bob’s Tow Service and was the owner of Cliff’s City Supply until he became disabled in 2010.

Clifford is survived by his loving wife, Debbie Cupp of Macon, Georgia; two sons, Joshua Cupp and Caleb Cupp, both of Macon; sister, Patricia Cupp Davis (Ken) of Lizella; two brothers, John Cupp (Cookie) of Lizella and Bobby Cupp (Kerri) of Granbury, Texas; nieces and nephews, Elizabeth Cupp Greene (Emory) of Americus, Heather Cupp of Lizella, Ashley Snook of Warner Robins, Alexis Cupp of McDonough, Lee Bateman (Alana) of Macon, TJ Bateman (Julie) of Macon, Logan Cupp of McDonough; and two great nieces, Kristin and Alyssa Bateman. He is preceded in death by his parents, James and Mona Cupp and his brother, Wayne Cupp.

In lieu of flowers, the family requests memorials to be made to Wycliffe Bible Translators at www.wycliffe.org/org/donate or to Gideons International, www.sendtheword.org in honor of Clifford E. Cupp.

Please visit www.sardisheardfunerals.com to express your condolences.

Sardis-Heard Funeral Home and Cremation Center, 6125 Houston Road, Macon, GA 31216 has charge of the arrangements.
